movies.title: The Anniversary at Shallow Creek
movies.plot: All American med student Sam has planned an intimate getaway surprise for his girlfriend Paige, until Sam's best friend, Paige's brother Anthony, invites himself and their three other best friends along. The carefree group of twenty-something's arrive at the remote, picturesque home of Sam's uncle, unaware they have walked into a trap. They will spend the night in a fight for their lives, where everyone's strength, stamina, and bonds will be tested. What would you do for love? Inspired by true events.
movies.simplePlot: Six best friends find themselves at the wrong place at the wrong time. They fight for their lives against a serial killer who has more in store for them than death.

biography.bio: Katharine Brandt is known for her work on Virgin (2003), Flesheater (2009) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Katharine Brandt

biography.bio: Annie Burgstede was born on September 18, 1983 in Wisconsin, USA as Anna Louise Burgstede. She is an actress and writer, known for Monumental (2017), Hes the Best (2015) and Days of Our Lives (1965).
biography.name: Annie Burgstede

biography.bio: Born in Cincinnati, Ohio to parents Anthony and Nancy Campanello on April 7, some would say the younger Anthony Campanello was a performer from jump street. At the age of three, Anthony could be seen mimicking the famous moves of Michael Jackson from the "Thriller" music video. Growing up, Anthony was a jock. He participated in baseball, basketball and football. He attended Cincinnati Moeller High School where he lettered on the nationally-ranked Moeller Crusader football team and was also a member of the school's wrestling team. After high school, he attended Bowling Green State University (Bowling Green, OH) where he majored in Psychology and The Arts. While at BGSU, he appeared in several stageplays, most notable, in the leading role of Brick in Tennessee Williams' "Cat On A Hot Tin Roof." He believes it was while doing that play in particular that he "caught the acting bug." After earning his college degree, Anthony found himself in Hollywood with several modeling assignments under his belt, including advertising campaigns for Abercrombie & Fitch and Gatorade. He went on to appear in such TV shows as "Nip/Tuck", "Next", "Smallville" and he also played actress Katie Holmes' boyfriend in "Dawson's Creek." He can also be seen in the role of Zach in the soon-to-be-released indie feature "Lost Dream" along side actors Patricia Richardson and Jeremy London as well as in a supporting role in the indie feature "Under The Gaydar." The role of Tony in "Redefining Normal" is the first starring film role for Anthony. In addition, he has been known to run in a number of marathons that benefit various children's charities. His LA actor training includes the Lesly Kahn Studio.
biography.name: Anthony Campanello

biography.bio: Eric Fischer was born in Cincinnati, Ohio to parents Mark and Linda Fischer. Eric has one sister, Kelly Fischer. Growing up in Ohio, Eric excelled in sports while also juggling a small acting career. At 18 years old he was drafted by the Chicago White Sox where he played in their organization for 6 years. Eric was then traded to the Minnesota Twins organization where he retired from baseball in 2005 due to enduring 4 arms surgeries. Eric then made the move to Los Angeles in 2007, turned back to his love of the arts, and immediately began booking commercials that led to work on feature films and TV as an actor. Soon after, Eric began producing feature films. Eric earned a BA from Cal State, Northridge with focuses in Film production and Electronic Media Management. Eric is married to fellow Filmmaker Brianna Lee Johnson. Eric and Brianna have two daughters: Maribelle Ann and Zella Leigh Fischer.
biography.name: Eric Fischer

biography.bio: Aaron Johnson is an actor and producer, known for 7 Below (2012) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Aaron Johnson

biography.bio: Brianna Lee Johnson is a producer and actress, known for 7 Below (2012), The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011) and Undrafted (2016).
biography.name: Brianna Lee Johnson

biography.bio: Jay Laisne is an actor and producer, known for Humanity's End (2008), The Hallway (2009) and Even If (2007).
biography.name: Jay Laisne

biography.bio: Marina Lyon is known for her work on Criminal Minds (2005), The Spirit (2008) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Marina Lyon

biography.bio: Brick Patrick is an actor, known for Insaisissables 2 (2016), The Triangle (2016) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Brick Patrick

biography.bio: Jeff Perry was born on August 16, 1955 in Highland Park, Illinois, USA. He is an actor and director, known for Scandal (2012), Nash Bridges (1996) and Wild Things (1998). He is married to Linda Lowy. They have one child. He was previously married to Laurie Metcalf.
biography.name: Jeff Perry

biography.bio: Pia Pownall is an actress, known for Haunted (2008), Erased (2008) and Papangul (2015).
biography.name: Pia Pownall

biography.bio: Corey Reilly is an actor, known for 7 Below (2012) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Corey Reilly

biography.bio: Jonathan Runyon is an actor and writer, known for L.A. Noire (2011), 2 Lava 2 Lantula! (2016) and Miami Medical (2010).
biography.name: Jonathan Runyon

biography.bio: Mary Elizabeth Runyon is an actress, known for Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland (2016), Undrafted (2016) and The Anniversary at Shallow Creek (2011).
biography.name: Mary Elizabeth Runyon

biography.bio: Josh Schell is an actor, known for For the Coyotes (2015), The Whistler (2013) and Pleased to Meet You (2012).
biography.name: Josh Schell
